documents.document: Timeless actors like Dean Martin put me in mind of myths: they're as timeless as Disney's best animated films
#Irony: When the societies that are led by exalted presidents establish the commonest norms. #Exalted=#Common #Society
One does not simply read a pamplet on magic. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be wizard that isn't willing to read every magic book and journal in every library, you may as well renounce sorcery now.
Most popsicles are icy, but others are as 'icy' as a warm shower
#Irony: When the snails that are protected by armored shells lay fragile eggs. #Armored=#Fragile #Snail
Temperamental criminals like Scott Evil put me in mind of divas: they're as temperamental as a pet cat waiting for dinner
I painted this picture of Adrian Monk's analytical but nutty soul using analytical Vulcan-blood and nutty Wonka-goldticket-gold. https://t.co/RSSKWwpGPO
🌞. Gain faith 🌤. Become a convert 🌬. Be piqued by the "mysteries of faith" 🌩. Become a sleuth 🌂. Lose your faith #MysteryFaithVenn https://t.co/RIYYkPFagC
Corrupt mayors like Mayor Joe Quimby put me in mind of mafiosi: they're as corrupt as Louisiana
Blessed are the stoic mimes that resort to words, for they shall start toilet training and become crying infants. #ThingsJesusNeverSaid
Decadent billionaires like Croesus put me in mind of champagnes: they're as decadent as a hot tub in a limousine
I composed this wallpaper using Refrigerator-white on Mushroom-brown. When I asked for apt names, 113 of you suggested "The Ice Crust." https://t.co/4Bt7pNhMVO
Shallow politicians like Donald Rumsfeld put me in mind of mouthpieces: they're as shallow as a birdbath
#VladimirPutin is the #HansGruber of #ModernRussia: controlling and manipulative, yet resolute too.
If #VladimirPutin is just like #HansGruber, controlling and manipulative, then who in #DieHard is #GarryKasparov most like? #ModernRussia
#Irony: When the witnesses that are called to the most unjust trials also testify about the fairest crimes. #Unjust=#Fair
Fiery cowboys like Yosemite Sam put me in mind of fevers: they're as fiery as a vibrant crimson
I composed this wallpaper using Pansy-purple on Primrose-yellow. When I asked for apt names, 70 of you suggested "The Eggplant Parmesan." https://t.co/cNy2XCkVSe
Entertaining campaigners like Robert Downey Jr. put me in mind of acrobats: they're as entertaining as a blind meter maid
What if #TheAdventureOfTheFinalProblem were about #ModernMilitaryHistory? #CarlVonClausewitz could be its #SherlockHolmes: shrewd and rational, yet militaristic too.
If #CarlVonClausewitz is #SherlockHolmes in epaulets, who in #ModernMilitaryHistory is #ProfessorMoriarty most like?
Brute: A lumbering giant, flaunting a giant's strength. #Brute=#Giant
Most loners like Mr. Bean are introverted, but others are as 'introverted' as a package of coco puffs
"Yes, it is better to be a slut buying an uncomfortable corset than a millionaire buying a luxurious yacht." #ThingsTrumpNeverSaid
Soulless gentlemen like Dorian Gray put me in mind of automatons: they're as soulless as a vamp
A diplomat calling himself @security_writer writes "Last night I dreamt I was an impartial scientist designing a creation."
In your dream CREATION = GOVERNMENT, @security_writer. Governments are represented by political diplomats. Are you impartial or political?
Hunter: An armed officer, honing (and ultimately losing) an officer's instincts. #Hunter=#Officer
Vendor. noun. A blend of 5 parts sale-achieving salesperson to 4 parts stand-operating exhibitor. #Vendor=#Exhibitor #Vendor=#Salesperson
Most lighthouses are constant, but others are as 'constant' as skirt hems
When it comes to the desserts they make, some pastry chefs are little better than dishonest scammers.
Dishonest pastry chefs make the wrong desserts the way scammers make misrepresentations. #Pastry_chef=#Scammer #Dessert=#Misrepresentation
Most singers are musical, but others are as 'musical' as a wet fart
Weak is the force in tender babes if maturity they reach. Buy cattle, they will. Tough ranchers will they be. #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
I painted this picture of #GeorgeWashington's innermost soul using farseeing Yoda-green, athletic Superman-blue and humorless corpse-grey. https://t.co/wfm7gtf776
Most crusaders are purposeful, but others are as 'purposeful' as a pudding
🌞. Study magic 🌤. Become a sorceress 🌬. Conduct abusive rituals 🌩. Turn into a tyrant 🌈. Renounce sorcery anyway #AbusiveVenn https://t.co/DordctjEpd
Most persecutions are nasty, but others are as 'nasty' as Britney Spears
🌞. Impose control 🌤. Fight the "change of control" 🌬. Act like a conservative, not a controller 🌩. Accept change 🌂. Lose control https://t.co/250v8ZBpfV
Guilt leads to the shame that causes misery. Conscience produces the shame that causes misery. Take your pick. #Guilt=#Conscience?
Sour teachers like Severus Snape put me in mind of whiskeys: they're as sour as battery acid
Mystics deliver teachings. Hunters use the dogs that obey the masters that deliver teachings. Who is better? #Hunter=#Mystic
Unstable athletes like Luis Suarez put me in mind of madmen: they're as unstable as a pro lifer on a unicycle
Empire starts the wars that cause killings. Conflict starts the wars that cause killings. Take your pick. #Empire=#Conflict?
A mourner asks: "Last night I dreamt I was a filmmaker, attending a festival. What could this mean?" #Joyful=#Gloomy
Festivals are joyful while funerals are usually gloomy. You wish that attending a funeral was more like attending a festival.
Adventurous mice like Mickey Mouse put me in mind of astronauts: they're as adventurous as Anthony Bourdain
I call this picture "Tyrant". I painted it with ambitious Ikarus-sun-orange, unfeeling storm-grey and demanding baby-pink. #TyrantRGB https://t.co/8YJEzy1VIg
Most insults are provocative, but others are as 'provocative' as General Hospital
🕘. Enter a competition 🕛. Become a competitor 🕑. Play a rowdy game 🕞. Turn into a demonstrator 🕔. Be defeated by your opponents #RowdyVenn https://t.co/cnOhLjuicQ
Jolly philanthropists like Santa Claus put me in mind of rogues: they're as jolly as Santa Claus
Not all infants are calm, just as not every punk is agitated. There's Zen in Venn #MenOfVenn https://t.co/YvSyyPRkxy
Devoted evangelists are like converts when they exercise the influence of religion. #Evangelist=#Convert
Selfish evangelists are more like bullies, for theirs is the influence of aggression. #Evangelist=#Bully #Evangelist=#Convert
Most mirages are elusive, but others are as 'elusive' as an apple tree
🕘. Be hired by the king 🕛. Become an anonymous valet 🕑. Seek anonymity as an anchorite 🕞. Be dismissed by the king 🕔. Reject anonymity https://t.co/MNNik1zuIN
Most lions are fearless, but others are as 'fearless' as a chicken
God. noun. 1. One who issues dictates. 2. One who combines a tyrant's rule with a magician's power. #God=#Magician #God=#Tyrant
I dreamt I was starring in TV shows with #WilliamShatner when we were melted with a rocket-fuel Molotov cocktail by #NeilArmstrong
I guess #NeilArmstrong and #WilliamShatner represent warring parts of my personality: the humble vs. conceited sides. #Humble=#Conceited
Catchy singers like Garth Brooks put me in mind of nicknames: they're as catchy as bird flu
A dictator calling himself @war_casualty writes "Last night I dreamt I was a powerful warrior preparing for war." #Dictator=#Warrior
In your dream WAR = EMPIRE, @war_casualty. Empires are typically ruled by deposed dictators. Are you powerful or deposed? #Dictator=#Warrior
Most magistrates are official, but others are as 'official' as the Cow Marines
To some food writers, food is a comfortable luxury. To others, it is a torturous struggle. #Food=#Luxury #Food=#Struggle
An angler asks: "Last night I dreamt I was an artist, using a brush. What could this mean?" #Flexible=#Rigid
Brushes are flexible while rods are usually rigid. You wish that using a rod was more like using a brush. #Flexible=#Rigid
Eccentric scientists like Albert Einstein put me in mind of trolls: they're as eccentric as Andy Warhol
This visual metaphor is for @ryandemaal on https://t.co/MId1pkLkp8, thanks for the colours! It's titled "No Futura." #VisMetRGB https://t.co/j1veMpXhKL
Fragile invalids like Tiny Tim Cratchit put me in mind of dragonflies: they're as fragile as a truck load of nitro glycerine
🕘. Be promoted by a school 🕛. Become a head 🕑. Acquire the "School of Technology" 🕞. Become a licensor 🕔. Resign from the school you work in https://t.co/ugzdHDARuL
Not all bishops are learned. Some are as illiterate as the most rural peasant. #Bishop=#Peasant?
What prompts learned bishops to relinquish sceptres, to bow to overlords and to become illiterate peasants? #Bishop=#Peasant?
Atmospheric singers like Tom Waits put me in mind of illusions: they're as atmospheric as disney land
I painted this picture of #EdwardScissorhands's innermost soul using gentle rose-red, innocent peach-pink and mechanical robot-grey. https://t.co/iZTrKQYNCJ
Most standards are acceptable, but others are as 'acceptable' as the n word in the United States
Blessed are the carefree playboys that marry fashion models, for they shall be incarcerated for offenses and become shackled convicts https://t.co/T7L7xvYdKu
Most gigolos are amorous, but others are as 'amorous' as a visit to the dentist
Strong is the force in ignorant babes if maturity they reach Study theology, they will Erudite theologians will they be #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
Blessed are the conservative reactionaries that reject extremism, for they shall shave heads and become punk skinheads #GospelOfVenn https://t.co/TjdUJ1ivRy
Jealous celebrities like O.J. Simpson put me in mind of stalkers: they're as jealous as Ares
Last night I dreamt I was a publicist, promoting a movie. What does this mean? #Movie
Well, to dream that you are playing a role in the movie foretells that something from your subconscious is about to emerge or be revealed.
Most commuters are mobile, but others are as 'mobile' as a parking meter
To some analysts, information is a pampered child. To others, it is a poor mouse. #Information=#Child #Information=#Mouse
Most politicians like Dan Quayle are chiseled, but others are as 'chiseled' as a Krispy Kreme
Not all surgeons are tidy, just as not every mendicant is shabby. The Venn don't lie #MenOfVenn https://t.co/cR51QOzGAO
"I fear I'm becoming a psycho," baaed a sick sheep. "My conspiracy is the biggest and the best," chirped a crab, "Come join mine".
So the crab trained the sick sheep to nurture a petty obsession. That is how the sick sheep became a pedant. #Psycho=#Pedant
Most microbes are infectious, but others are as 'infectious' as tap water
Claustrophobic professors like Robert Langdon put me in mind of cockpits: they're as claustrophobic as a coffin
🌕. Set out to become a winning athlete 🌖. Join a team 🌗. Realize you've joined a team of defeated prisoners 🌘. So be sentenced to a gulag
Last night I dreamt I was trading in wives with #KingHenryVIII when we were kicked senseless with a golden boot by #DavidBeckham #Fit=#Fat
I guess #DavidBeckham and #KingHenryVIII represent warring parts of my personality: the fit vs. fat sides. #Fit=#Fat
Competitive athletes like Eddy Merckx put me in mind of bulldogs: they're as competitive as New York
What if a 🐺, who thought it was Jenna Maroney, fell in love with a 🐙 who thought it was Tracy Jordan? #JennaMaroney=#TracyJordan
Tracy the 🐙 was worried but needed certainty more than comfort. #JennaMaroney=#TracyJordan
🐙🤒🐺🌡🔥📋💊 (or: 🐺 diagnosed 🐙) So at first, Jenna the 🐺 ran tests and offered Tracy the 🐙 a diagnosis.
🐺🛠🔛🐙 (or: 🐺 operated on 🐙) Then Jenna the 🐺 performed surgery on Tracy the 🐙.
